known_issues: App performance issue: some load times are very long; user requests overall smoother/fluid experience.

existing_features.title: Reduce redundant React Query refetching to improve perceived performance, especially for cards loading.
Reduce the number of backend calls needed to render the Portfolio page by introducing a single backend query that returns a portfolio summary/snapshot used by the UI.
Tune React Query caching and invalidation strategy for portfolio-related data so mutations do not cause excessive refetch storms and long post-mutation loading states.
Ensure all user-facing loading/error text introduced or modified as part of these performance fixes is in English.
